website_summaries.verdict: Great value and great for toning thighs, abs, and legs.
pros: Earns rave reviews from petite owners who often find other rings too large
Retains shape and strength longer than most other rings on the market
Company claims they've never had a complaint about a broken ring
cons: Doesn't come with booklet showing exercises, but you can find plenty of online instruction

customer_reviews.title: Exceecise ring!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use this when I can’t take my Pilates class. Just like the one in my Pilates class
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I am really out of shape. Having osteoporosis I was wanting something to help me with my inner thighs that wasn’t heavy or hard to use. This works well and is very well made. I recommend this for people who are beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Smith

customer_reviews.title: A terrific way to get some strength back in my replaced hip (and the other one, too)
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a hip replaced and was on the lookout for some of the tools my physical therapist has been using. This is one of them, and it's great. I'm not allowed to bend enough to use ankle weights, and this ring solves that problem. I just slip it over my feet and slide it above my knees for abductor work, or place it between my knees for adductor work. It couldn't be easier to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: peg2

customer_reviews.title: Great ring!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to order, based on some of the negative reviews of this product, but it came in perfect condition and works just as described! The seller also e-mailed suggestions for how to use the ring. I'm very pleased with my purchase and the ProBody Pilates Ring is a welcome addition to my exercise routine!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: It was dirty and the yellow covering was dented
customer_reviews.text: The ring appeared used!! It was dirty and the yellow covering was dented, and the ring was weak as if it had been used over the past 3 years in a yoga class!! VERY disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates Magic Circle!
customer_reviews.text: I am a great fan of the pilates magic circle. I purchased this one to keep at the office. I like it because I can quickly do exercises by putting it between my ankles, above the knees, or in my hands. I can do a few quick exercises throughout the day to energize myself. This circle is sturdy, but not overly difficult to press. Some of the metal circles are difficult to press. The cushioned pads feel nice on the palms and above the ankles where skin is sensitive. I would encourage others to consider purchasing this pilates circle.
customer_reviews.author: Aventurera Etermal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for the Company
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the company because after a few weeks of using the pilate ring as a floor exercise to strengthen my back and core I noticed it lost its tension- wasn't as strong as when I first used it. Well, I contacted the company and without question they refunded my payment and told me to keep the ring ! Now a days when companies try to overcharge. are impossible to reach if you need them, and don't care if the customer is satisfied I found this extremely refreshing. Nice doing business with someone who genuinely wants the consumer to be happy with their purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as sturdy or tough as the rings you use in physical therapy offices. Plus the pink color came totally stained with dirty black marks
customer_reviews.author: Fastpitch Power

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: OUCH MY THIGHS!! This thing is awesome! It's comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved without box. Looked used? Was nicked and ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved without box. Looked used? Was nicked and inner pads fell off when I picked it up but I was able to stick them back. No accompanying booklet. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: This is not the full size circle. It's about 3/4 the normal size and I don't see the dimensions in the description listed above. It has a bag but this product is useless if you need a correct sized pilates magic circle. What a joke! zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: RJW

customer_reviews.title: High quality, versatile, excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I did research and bought this ring! My daughter wanted a thigh toner - and I couldn't find one that had high enough ratings, so I came across this. Not only does this work as a thigh toner, but it also strengthens / tones your arms and legs. There are so many ways to use this! You can also tell it is of high quality. Sooooo pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this version.
customer_reviews.text: Under normal circumstances, I would have tried to return this, but I didn't want to run an extra errand while COVID is raging. I'll donate it some day or throw it away. It isn't very sturdy and doesn't provide the kind of resistance I need for chest press. I'm using the large exercise ball I already had. I wish I had known. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Mirren

customer_reviews.title: Miscolored and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This ring showed up dirty or miscolored with multiple scars in the ring. The pads were falling off as well(see pics)
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Too Weak For Me
customer_reviews.text: I found this Pilates circle to be too weak “for me”. There was not enough resistance for me and when using for an isometric inner thigh squeeze I felt if I kept pushing it would break. I am a beginner but still need a challenge. I returned it and purchased a Stotts Pilates/Merrithew Fitness Circle Pro after seeing this same brand in my local Pilates studio. The Stotts/Merrithew ring is made of three layers of metal (this ring is made of plastic I believe) and is very challenging. It is exactly what I was looking for. This ring would be ideal for those who are looking for something with light resistance.
customer_reviews.author: KRW

customer_reviews.title: This product was dirty and had scuff marks on it
customer_reviews.text: This product was dirty and had scuff marks on it. I guess it'll do the job, but I really didn't want someone's used exercise equipment. This was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I use Pilates rings in the gym. They are very helpful for increasing resistance. I bought this because I was going out of town for 7 weeks, and I wanted to stay in shape. This particular ring is pretty mild to medium in terms of resistance. It is a nice color and fits in a carry-on luggage bag, but I'd have to say it was not worth the effort because I had to do too many reps to get a good workout with the ring...maybe that's okay on a vacation, but I prefer the sturdier brand my gym uses, "Balanced Body."
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Prob good for a BEGINNER as resistance on ring is very low :(
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this but it’s unfortunately disappointing in the amount of resistance in this. I am almost able to touch my legs/knees together when squeezing the ring which means there is way too little resistance-honestly squeezing a $5 yoga block accomplishes the same thing for the Pilates inner thigh exercises. Really wish I would have found this ring to be a great challenge especially because of the great reviews (which is a huge reason I bought). Also think it should be a little bigger it’s awkward w/ the smaller size ring. Maybe it wouldn’t need to be bigger if it had a lot more resistance. Prob good for a BEGINNER w/ hardly any muscle lol
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney S

customer_reviews.title: little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: as with other reviewers I did find that it is a little easier to use than those at the pilates studio. The tension is definitely not as sturdy and since I am a beginner it will suffice for now but I can see me having to replace this as I get stronger very soon. I would purchase if I was lacking in strength and just starting out on my health journey BUT I would not purchase otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: kahuna Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Resistance did not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: The strength of this ring didn’t last very long. My mom uses it to strengthen her leg and thighs. The ring has started to turn into an oval and does not provide much resistance anymore to provide any real exercise. My mom is almost 60, which really makes me feel like this thing should not be deforming this early on. Pretty disappointing to say the least as I bought this as a gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: First time using a Pilates Ring and though I am a routine exerciser I have not done a Pilates workout before. Saw an advertisement for this product and thought it would add a different type of challenge - it did. Reason I did not give a 5 star is that it did not come with any instructions or exercise suggestions - went to YouTube for that. But I would recommend this .. the other rings where pricier and this seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLifeLola

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to the "Fitness Magic Circle" during a physical therapy session to help strengthen my legs. I really liked how much easier it was to use the circle, rather than a rubber ball for exercises. A ball slips easily and doesn't allow for as much strength building. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Bergerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pilates ring to add to your home workout
customer_reviews.text: This ring is great, it’s easy to use, and though it doesn’t feel like , it does have a good amount of give when pushing the handles together, it’s working ! My arms were super sore the next day . It has two handle like spots( picture #2) on each side which helps you stay in the correct spot and maintain the right position, each is padded so it doesn’t dig into your arm , side or leg. It came with a great little bag( picture #3) to carry it in or just to store it.this was my first time buying and using a Pilates ring, but I’m super happy with this product and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Starr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: Since I am taking online Pilates classes, I decided to purchase my own Pilates ring. This is perfect! It comes in different colors, but I decided on black. It is the same quality as at the studio when I was taking Pilates in person, perfect for all the positions that the Pilates teacher recommends. Great product, prompt delivery, appropriate packaging.
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: For all you “not so fit” people too!
customer_reviews.text: I have everything needed to exercise, but the tv and boredom gets in the way. Well here’s how you start! Great little gadget that fits into my routine. Start sitting watching tv, ring between legs (or arms) and every commercial start pumping. Continue till show comes back on, rest, wait for next commercial and start again. Works well for those with their own built in resistance. Not hugely comfortable, but doable. Feel the burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Zero resistance, flimsy, and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how weak and flimsy this is. There is zero resistance, and it is so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: So. Comfortable. To. Use. The little pads are so nice and don't hurt when pressed between my knees or sensitive upper thigh meat. I already feel the burn. I opened my product about 10 minutes ago and I already am so in love I had to leave a review while I use it and finish my movie. Great way to passively exercise while you watch netflix!!
customer_reviews.author: Keirstyn Price

customer_reviews.title: Seriously consider for class and home
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Pilates classes so I got a Magic Circle to use at home. There are many ways you can use it for strength and resistance exercises. Using it to replace standard ab crunches is a favorite — I get the benefit without straining. I’ve used a circle that has foam grips, but it didn’t stay in place the way the Magic Circle does. Especially if you are taking Pilates classes you should consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: AZ RVer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Since coronavirus caused the cancellation of many workout classes, it was necessary for me to try to keep up my level of fitness. I decided to buy the Pilates ring but wasn't sure I would like it. It came with a sheet of instructions which were easy to follow and all were exercises that I have previously done in class. The ring itself is very sturdy and comfortable to use so it has been very easy to keep up my Pilates ring work. I am so glad I bought it as it is well worth the price and effort.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ in Clive Iowa

customer_reviews.title: They are claiming that it's unbreakable?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 71 year old mother and this ring came apart on the second use!! I am only glad that it did not hit her face instead it damaged the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's made for👍
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, everytime I go to bend inward feels like its going to break when im working my inner thighs as well as my arms. But I must say it definitely does the job. FEELING THE RESULTS AND IM HAPPY ABOUT THAT. I just wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: DELCIA

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this wont break on me later.
customer_reviews.text: I am upset about how this showed up looking like this. I just hope this doesnt rip or anything later down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: With the COVID-19 pandemic, I have not returned to my Pilates studio. I've missed using a ring in my workouts. I searched high and low for one that had good reviews. I settled on this one and it was by far the right choice. I was so happy with my purchase, I bought two more - one for my daughter and for my husband. In a span of one month, I purchased three of these rings. The quality is great and it's definitely improved my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: LFAVE

customer_reviews.title: Very happy ☺
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I am not some little stick, but this has held up well to the use. Seems to work great with many different workouts. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had never seen or heard of a Pilates ring until they were brought out in an exercise class where I was. I really liked the exercises we did with the rings and felt that they were suitable and simple exercise equipment that would take up very little space in my home. I ordered the Pilates Ring through Amazon offered by ProBody Pilates. It is exactly as described, very sturdy and a quality product. The company has been quite communicative regarding my order. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a good amount of give
customer_reviews.text: I learned that the ring isn't supposed to be iron firm. It's supposed to be just firm enough to engage specific muscles without over engaging. The first ring I got, different brand, was tooo floppy and flimsy. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa!

customer_reviews.title: Beat up and missing instructions like the other reviews say
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would be a better product because the more recent reviews seemed to be better, however, I was wrong. The ring itself is beat up (without discoloration) in several spots, despite adequate packaging to prevent damage during shipping, and no instructions/exercises were included. Purchase with caution. I ordered the pink and the colors of the ring and yellow logo on the side pads were true to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It's a what??
customer_reviews.text: I got my ProBody Pilates Ring and I am so pleased with the product. I can several things with it but I'm mostly please with the exercise that you squeeze your thighs together with it. I have a nerve problem and strengthening my left side is very important to me. This helps without putting a strain on the rest of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneaky Tough Workout Device
customer_reviews.text: The Magic ring is one of those gizmos that seem almost too simple, and not possibly useful or effective. But its design creates very versatile functional workouts for upper and lower body fitness goals. I only wish it provided me more resistance and felt a little more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: RiverdaleRay61

customer_reviews.title: Recommendation From My Physical Therapist
customer_reviews.text: This product is enhancing my therapy at home between PT visits. During PT, my therapist occasionally adds the Pilates Ring to certain exercises. It actually enhances the benefit I receive from doing the exercises and I decided to purchase to use on the five days per week I and not with the therapist. It comes with a bag where I now store my strap and the elastic bands I use along with the paper description and frequency of the exercises. I can easy carry all of the devices I need to my office and get all day benefit of being able to improve my hips and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rosenzweig

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective Exercise Device For Home Use
customer_reviews.text: This Pilates Ring is of a slightly lower quality than some I have seen, but it works almost as well. The grip pads could be just a tad thicker for comfort. It comes with a carry bag and an 8 and 1/2 by 11 inch card with exercises depicted. I am using it for home therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Ess

customer_reviews.title: I Picked the Right One!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new turquoise Pilates ring. It comes with a nice bag that for now keeps the dust off and hopefully will someday be useful for bringing to the gym (if the pandemic ever ends)! It appears to be well made and I am confident that the ring will last for a long time. It is working well for my Pilates classes that I do 1-2 X/wk on Facebook live.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, adds versatility to my workouts
customer_reviews.text: I use YouTube workout videos (Pilates Ring Workouts) and found the ring adds variety to my routine, while giving options to work on core, legs, abs, arms. I switch out my Pilates “toys” everyday, so I don’t get bored. The ring can be put away, in a closet, under a bed, without taking much room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Reading and Sewing in South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: glad I got the recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I have been having hip problems and a friend's personal trainer highly recommend I get the ring. I'm very pleased with this one and glad I selected this particular one and since the delivery was so quick I'm also glad I picked this company.
customer_reviews.author: graciegirl

customer_reviews.title: Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: I was receiving physical therapy which was prescribed by my physician. After I was released from physical therapy I was to continue the exercises at home. One of the devices used was the Pilates ring. I purchased this device to continue to strengthen certain muscle groups in my legs. I have already noticed a change in my legs and plan to continue the exercises as part of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this ring because it’s not sturdy enough and very cheaply made! No tension at all when I place between my knees to squeeze like we do in Pilates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am not very strong but when I went to use this it sounded like it was going to break. A pt ball or bands would work better and take up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong , really feels strong
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I just got this and I am very happy with it as a beginner Peice my thighs are super sore I got it to use in my bed ( I’m kinda lazy and like to watch Netflix ) Like I said I started using it and my thighs are literally on fire I worries about the resistance because I am a bigger lady but it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: Heather Martin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for hip/thigh exercises, but it comes with a little booklet of other suggestions. It's well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: NC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Circle for Pilates Training
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this Pilates ring. It is sturdy, flexible, and easy to grip. It gives good resistance for strength training. I’ve only had the ring for a week so I cannot report on durability. I notice that when I squeeze hard It feels like something inside is folding. Hopefully that is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Got this today... flimsy..multiple dents around the ring. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Really gives you a good workout. I keep it next to my desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Really gives you a good workout. I keep it next to my desk at work and use it for arms and thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: I think I'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: This circle arrived a couple of hours ago and I have been trying some of the exercises on the enclosed sheet. This is what I had hoped and has just the right amount of tension for this old lady who wants to keep her muscles toned! A week later: This is a great gadget which I use every day. It's super strong and flexible and I'll be using it for years! Really great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. You can work so many muscles with this little contraption it isn't even funny. If I were to have one piece of gym equipment in my home, this would be it. Do not waste money on a pilates class. Buy this and get a book on it along with a few bands and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Immediate impact!
customer_reviews.text: I felt the strength of using this Pilates Ring from the moment I first used it. Muscles are worked from the elbow to the shoulder every time I've used it and that has made me more determined to keep it up. I see shapely arms in my future, stronger shoulders and upper back muscles; hopefully a stronger core. :-)
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been using it as much as I should but can def tell the difference in my muscle tone with my minimal use. Starting adding more time to my workout and excited about seeing more results. Very good for inner thigh toning.
customer_reviews.author: Black Eyed Beauty

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I had never used one of these magic circles before so when my personal trainer suggested that I buy one for our virtual Pilates workouts, I read the reviews for the cheaper circles and found that a lot of people found that they broke soon after using them. I decided to pay a little more and hope that the investment paid off. I have been using it for about a month and so far there have been no issues around the integrity of it. I found a promo code from the company’s website and was able to apply it to the Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: The product is fantastic - sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is fantastic - sturdy, fun color, and I look forward to using it at home to improve my strength. I also like the fact that they have a website where you can go for tips and ideas on using the magic circle. Additionally, the product arrived extremely quickly, and in great packaging. Very satisfied so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Adriana Motaescu

customer_reviews.title: Pilattes Ring
customer_reviews.text: very simple gadget but it create the resistance I needed for my back exercises. the service was exceptional. I ordered it one evening and it showed the day after, 2 days earlier than scheduled. has it's own bag, which makes it easy to carry if going to work out with someone else. all in all very pleased with the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: nemahelk

customer_reviews.title: Magic Circle is So Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing - there are lots of videos on the internet on exercises that you can do with this thing. I love it! It's easy to keep tucked behind my sofa, so I can exercise with it when I'm watching TV. Also, I plan in packing it when I travel so I can exercise at other destinations - it's thin enough that I can lay it in my suitcase and pack it - a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: amano

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is, as the old saying goes, the best thing since sliced bread. So effective and easy to use. It is helping my husband who has a bad back to feel better. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene McLain

customer_reviews.title: incredibly flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting or hoping this would be like the one we use at Pilates; it's not. I feel like I could pancake it, it's so flimsy. Sending back tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon120

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for Mat Pilates
customer_reviews.text: I'm really missing my Reformer Class, but using the Pilates Ring helps me to complete the exercises I have found online.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Manaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the pilates ring 5 times in 5 days, and I love it. It's got great resistance for its size, so it makes an awesome "at home" work out tool! I look forward to ordering more from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brawner

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Feel like i'm getting a good workout with this product and seeing results. Easy to use, can do some different workouts so you don't feel like you're limited doing the same thing each time. Arrived timely so i wasn't waiting too long to get it...Tried to buy one from PelRing, but they took my $ and ran with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly. Looks new. It’s shipped in a bag with bubble wrap so I can see how it can get damaged. Mine came in looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Patella

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is really good but if you have short legs like me it’s kinda big. I have to really open my knees to get it between my legs to work my inner thighs. I mean it still works but I guess at that point it’s a very advanced inner thigh workout lol! Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting ring fit adventure for the switch and doing some research about isometrics. This does a pretty good job of working some uncommonly used muscles that really can help with advanced exercises down the line.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mazzatenta

customer_reviews.title: Good ring for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying this pilates ring and think for the price and convenience of Amazon shopping it's a good buy. It doesn't seem like the sturdiest ring out there, but does work well. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good ring who doesn't want to spend > $50 on one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Such an efficient piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. There is a myriad of workouts online to follow along using a "Magic circle" aka Pilates ring. It would easily tuck into a suitcase for workouts on the road as well! Great for tacking on to longer workouts or all on its own. You can use it for any part of your body. Why did it take me so long to discover this!?
customer_reviews.author: E. Trost

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend. She loves it. She uses it when we are watching movies together or just sitting on the couch. A lot of reviews said that it was too stiff, or that it made a cracking noise. We found none of that with ours. Works great to strengthen your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Greene

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: It’s even better than the one I use in PT. After surgery for a herniated disc, my physical therapist gave me exercises using the ring. They were much more fun than some of the others I had to do. Now I have my own:-)
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes reading all the great reviews. However, as soon as I got it out of the box, there were several indents and marks on the ring. Some are very noticeable and some are not, but not what I expected. Almost seems as if it will just give out if I were to put a little bit too much pressure inward. It might be just my one unit that was defective, but not happy with it. Would not buy again. Will try other ones.
customer_reviews.author: stacy kang

customer_reviews.title: Probody Pilates Ring.
customer_reviews.text: This was a quarantine purchase for home works. Love Pilates and this ring gives you the ability to do the work at home. It includes a poster with suggested exercises and carrying bag. This is an #instamom #fabfind.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Seeing results in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few weeks Ago to target my inner thighs and I am already seeing great results. I do sets off 20 every night and add 20 every 3/5 days. It’s very easy to use and stores away nicely right beside my bed. Yes I work this on my bed while watching tv it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: KROD1014

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love working with my ProBody Pilates Ring. The company is very helpful in supporting the customers and making sure that things are going well and smoothly. The product is solid and is an asset for anyone trying to get or stay in shape. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The product was on time and it is a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product was on time and it is a great quality product. I like the fact that you can receive free tips and workouts on the website. I also like that I can register the product for warranty coverage.It was a great shopping experience and I would definitely do bussiness again with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but lacking guidelines
customer_reviews.text: Product itself seems fine, but doesn't come with any guidelines on how to do exercises with them, nor does the company's website. Would rate higher if they offered even just a printed sheet with exercise tips. I'll be looking up tips on OTHER websites/You Tube.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Pilates Ring
customer_reviews.text: I have it in blue, but got a new purple mat so got new ring to match! Been using my other one > 3 years now and it still does great!
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't developed the habit of using yet - but I will....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Item as expected and helps me with my home workout.
customer_reviews.author: D Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Good quality, especially for the money. Comes with a cover and exercise instructions. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Pilates ring. I use in conjunction with DailyBurn's Pilates program and it is a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: J. Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be good
customer_reviews.text: Probably good but arrived damaged. Seller was excellent about refund. Didn't want to chance it again. Went with a different lifetime warrantied brand.
customer_reviews.author: lorinnn

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for the lazy exerciser ~ Magic Circle easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great invention for the lazy exerciser ~ easy to pack & take along wherever you go ~ important little piece of equipment to strengthen your muscles even while you sit ... a must have!
customer_reviews.author: malteseFalcon

customer_reviews.title: Best Arm Workout Ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't do pilates - I just bought the ring to replace my thighmaster and loved the idea of using it on my arms as well - I LOVE IT - I actually don't follow any of the exercises they show in the little handout that was included as there are a million interesting ways to use it - I showed it to my mom and she loved it so much she bought one for herself and my sister :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Damon

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a Pilates Ring before. It's a lot of fun & deceptive how affective it is. It balances the body more so than using bands to stretch the legs & arms. Having fun finding new ways to use it. The pink is pretty too
customer_reviews.author: Linda L C

customer_reviews.title: small easy to use and flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough to use on my arms but sturdy enough to use with my thighs. Easy to use while watching TV in bed or sitting in my desk working BUT WOW it works well because I was sore
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and very versatile excercise tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout tool. I have brought up some tough tube videos on other excercises to use it for. It is a great 'one piece' workout tool. Made well and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Good, little exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I ordered this because my physical therapist suggested I order one to do my exercises at home. It seems sturdy and I’m sure I’ll get use out of it for other workouts.
customer_reviews.author: S. V

customer_reviews.title: Came unglued
customer_reviews.text: The pads are glued on. The inside pad came off the first time I used it and when I tried to put it back on it kept sliding. The adhesive used is somewhat sticky but does not hold. I'll need to buy glue and try to get it to stick to the pad. Otherwise it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: F. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: There are better out there.
customer_reviews.text: This has so little resistance I would skip. It came with a bag. It looks nice. It just doesn’t feel sturdy and it definitely isn’t very resistant. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ACarter

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the ones at my Pilates studio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magic circle for my home pilates practice. It arrived promptly and it's a decent product but it's not nearly as substantial and sturdy as the ones that my Pilates studio uses. It'll be ok for occasional home use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Z. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am using the ring for some pilates and yoga, it works good. The cushions are comfortable and protect well. And the ring DOESN'T smell when it arrives. In addition it has it's own carry on bag of you want to take your own to the studio. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: A quality product, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a few days, but this product seems very well made. I love that it has both the outer and inner grip spots and that the ring itself is enclosed in a 'easy on your hands' flexible liner. A really nice touch was the bag it came in which makes it easy to tote around. I'm going to get another one to keep in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M Yudell

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Started using it this September and I was amazed of it's versatility in pilates workout. Long way to go with this buddy and hope it will help me reach my target weight after few months.
customer_reviews.author: jmth

customer_reviews.title: It is unbreakable.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product that I could use over and over, applying lots of pressure - and still be confident that it would not break. This pilates ring meets my criteria. I also like the color selections.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this only several times thus far in my Pilates class and really like it! I am looking forward to taking it when I travel. It came with suggestions but truthfully, they weren’t “user friendly “. It would be great if the user suggestions were on laminated cards to follow. Not a deal breaker since I take it to my class and follow the instructor but it would be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I thought this would be much better. It is nothing like the ones in the pilates studio. With just the slightest amount of pressure it completely collapses. Do not purchase if you intend to do any resistance exercises with it. Complete waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Labrador229

customer_reviews.title: not enough padding! not even close!
customer_reviews.text: for starters yes it works, yes i feel the burn. but the padding or lack there of makes the ring painful on your inner things to use for a decent work out time.
customer_reviews.author: josh77073

product_meta.title: Pilates Ring - Superior Unbreakable Fitness Magic Circle for Toning Thighs, Abs and Legs
product_meta.description:
LOOKING TO TONE AND FIRM THOSE PROBLEM AREAS? WANT TO MAXIMIZE YOUR WORKOUTS AND STRENGTHEN YOUR CORE? 

Discover the ProBody Pilates Fitness Circle and improve your muscle tone, flexibility and fitness. Like a thigh master, target your inner and outer thighs, upper arms and neck. 

Take charge and unlock all the benefits of Pilates. The Pilates Circle was designed with your “powerhouse” in mind – the area between the pubic bone and rib cage, from your front to back. 

Introducing A Convenient and Lightweight Core Muscle Conditioning Pilates Circle 

The ProBody Pilates Ring is a 14” composite ring protected by a plastic laminate and soft foam cover. It is designed to never snap or lose its spring. Enjoy years of use. With moisture resistant padded grips on both the inside and outside you are free to explore a variety of workouts with varying intensity. The form-molded grips fit comfortably against your body with professional-grade padding. 

WE OFFER A RISK FREE, BETTER THAN MONEY GUARANTEE 

We’re so happy with our quality, that should your Magic Circle break, we will give you a FULL REFUND AND A NEW ONE FOR FREE for the first 90 days of use! 

What are you waiting for – Meet those fitness goals for less than the cost of ONE month at the gym and you can have this revolutionary Pilates Circle to firm those stubborn areas & supercharge your strength & mobility. 

You also get FREE access to how-to instructional content, starting with three quick exercises to start immediately. 

ORDER NOW and get your product within a few short days. Consider getting one for your workout friends.
feature_bullets: TONE AND FIRM UP THOSE STUBBORN AREAS specifically on your INNER AND OUTER THIGHS, upper arms, hips, booty and neck. Like a thigh master, but better.
GET FIT AND STRONG: Pilates improves your muscle tone and fitness when you practice regularly - at home or when traveling. Works for beginners or for men and women in peak sport training condition.

PERFECT YOUR POSTURE: perfect for those looking to develop muscular strength, increase body awareness, improve endurance, balance, and correct posture. Focus on arms, butt or other areas that need shaping.

LIGHTWEIGHT PORTABLE AND COMES WITH CARRYING POUCH: Perfect for travel is low weight (ring is not steel) lays flat and adds very little volume. One of the must-have Pilates accessories. Great addition to reformer. 14 inch loop.
WE STAND BEHIND OUR PRODUCTS. We'll GIVE YOU A NEW ONE FREE should it break within the first 90 days!
